channel.title: Authors on Sustainable Fisheries Group
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Sustainable Fisheries Group

item.title: Staff Resources
item.description: Introduction R/RStudio Installation Packages Github Installation Gmail & Google Calendar Box Slack Introduction Here at SFG we use numerous programs and platforms to organize, collaborate, and conduct our research. While we recognize that everyone has a workflow that works for them, we want to make sure everyone is familiar with the tools we use and how to get the most out of them in your own workflows and project management.

item.title: Building a blog with Blogdown and GitHub
item.description: Does this put summary text on the main page and on the blog page?
